purpleculture_pinyin:
cuàn
to flee; to scuttle; to exile or banish; to amend or edit
бежать; затопить; изгнать или изгнать; изменить или отредактировать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 窜)
Ideographic: A mouse 鼠 running out of its hole 穴

• ⿱ Above to below
    • 穴 [ xué ] cave, den, hole
    • 鼠 [ shǔ ] rat, mouse
heisig_chinese_memo: If you see a mouse hole, it's only a matter of time before you see a mouse scurry out of it.
Ru_trainchinese: cuàn: (графема) (пренебрежительно о животных, бандитах) убегать, удирать; исправлять (текст)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Leave shish-kebab out for too long in china and you will catch a cockroach scurry away into the nearest hole when you approach it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " mouse ", from " acupoint ", the original meaning is to hide. "Shuowen": "(falling) [concealing] also. From the mouse in the hole." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Dinggong Four Years": "Heaven lures his heart, and punishes Chu, and the king scuttles it." Du Yu Note: "Channeling, hiding."

" Fleeing " can mean running away. "Yi‧ Litigation": "If you don't avoid litigation, you will go back to you." Lu Deming explained: "Flee, go away."

" Channeling " also means exile. "Shu-Shun Dian": "Liu Gonggong works in Youzhou, spends joy in Chongshan, traverses the three seedlings in Sanwei, and dies in Yushan, the four sins and the world is salty." Kong Yingda Shu: "The one who strays, throws away The name."

" Channeling " also means tolerance. "Xunzi‧ Confucianism": "Shen (Shen Dao) and Mo (Mo Di) are not allowed to enter the conversation, and Hui Shi and Deng Xi dare not scrutinize them."

" Channeling " also means modification. "Xunzi ‧ Rectification of Names": "To distinguish traitors from the right way, and still to draw the rope to hold the straight, the heresy cannot be chaotic, and there is no way for a hundred schools to run."

" Channeling " also refers to mixed. "Han Shu·Wang Mang Chuan 1": "The chapter (sorrowful chapter) has changed names by himself, and all eleven people are appointed officials and assistants." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Channeling means that the toilet is also located."

" Channeling " also refers to smoking with medicine. "Historical Records-Biography of Bian Quecang": "The minister diagnosed the pulse and said: "Inner cold, the moon is not going to stop." So Yun."
humanum_short_description_en: From " mouse ", from " acupoint ", the original meaning is to hide.
humanum_full_description:
從「鼠」，從「穴」，本義為隱藏。《說文》：「（墜）[匿]也。从鼠在穴中。」《左傳‧定公四年》：「天誘其衷，致罰於楚，而君又竄之。」杜預注：「竄，匿也。」

　　「竄」可表示奔逃。《易‧訟》：「不克訟，歸逋竄也。」陸德明釋文：「竄，逃也。」

　　「竄」也表示放逐。《書‧舜典》：「流共工于幽州，放驩兜于崇山，竄三苗于三危，殛鯀于羽山，四罪而天下咸服。」孔穎達疏：「竄者，投棄之名。」

　　「竄」還表示容納。《荀子‧儒效》：「慎(慎到)、墨(墨翟)不得進其談，惠施、鄧析不敢竄其察。」

　　「竄」亦表示修改。《荀子‧正名》：「以正道而辨姦，猶引繩以持曲直，是故邪說不能亂，百家無所竄。」

　　「竄」還指參雜。《漢書‧王莽傳上》：「章(哀章)因自竄姓名，凡為十一人，皆署官爵，為輔佐。」顏師古注：「竄，謂廁著也。」

　　「竄」也指用藥熏。《史記‧扁鵲倉公列傳》：「臣意診脈，曰：『內寒，月事不下也。』即竄以藥，旋下，病已。」司馬貞索隱：「謂以燻燻之，故云。」

從「 鼠 」，從「 穴 」，本義為隱藏。《說文》：「（墜）[匿]也。从鼠在穴中。」《左傳‧定公四年》：「天誘其衷，致罰於楚，而君又竄之。」杜預注：「竄，匿也。」 「 竄 」可表示奔逃。《易‧訟》：「不克訟，歸逋竄也。」陸德明釋文：「竄，逃也。」 「 竄 」也表示放逐。《書‧舜典》：「流共工于幽州，放驩兜于崇山，竄三苗于三危，殛鯀于羽山，四罪而天下咸服。」孔穎達疏：「竄者，投棄之名。」 「 竄 」還表示容納。《荀子‧儒效》：「慎(慎到)、墨(墨翟)不得進其談，惠施、鄧析不敢竄其察。」 「 竄 」亦表示修改。《荀子‧正名》：「以正道而辨姦，猶引繩以持曲直，是故邪說不能亂，百家無所竄。」 「 竄 」還指參雜。《漢書‧王莽傳上》：「章(哀章)因自竄姓名，凡為十一人，皆署官爵，為輔佐。」顏師古注：「竄，謂廁著也。」 「 竄 」也指用藥熏。《史記‧扁鵲倉公列傳》：「臣意診脈，曰：『內寒，月事不下也。』即竄以藥，旋下，病已。」司馬貞索隱：「謂以燻燻之，故云。」
From " mouse", from " acupoint", the original meaning is to hide. "Shuowen": "(falling) [concealing] also. From the mouse in the hole." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Dinggong Four Years": "Heaven lures his heart, and punishes Chu, and the king scuttles it." Du Yu Note: "Channeling, hiding." " Fleeing" can mean running away. "Yi‧ Litigation": "If you don't avoid litigation, you will go back to you." Lu Deming explained: "Flee, go away." " Channeling" also means exile. "Shu-Shun Dian": "Liu Gonggong works in Youzhou, spends joy in Chongshan, traverses the three seedlings in Sanwei, and dies in Yushan, the four sins and the world is salty." Kong Yingda Shu: "The one who strays, throws away The name." " Channeling" also means tolerance. "Xunzi‧ Confucianism": "Shen (Shen Dao) and Mo (Mo Di) are not allowed to enter the conversation, and Hui Shi and Deng Xi dare not scrutinize them." " Channeling" also means modification. "Xunzi ‧ Rectification of Names": "To distinguish traitors from the right way, and still to draw the rope to hold the straight, the heresy cannot be chaotic, and there is no way for a hundred schools to run." " Channeling" also refers to mixed. "Han Shu·Wang Mang Chuan 1": "The chapter (sorrowful chapter) has changed names by himself, and all eleven people are appointed officials and assistants." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Channeling means that the toilet is also located." " Channeling" also refers to smoking with medicine. "Historical Records-Biography of Bian Quecang": "The minister diagnosed the pulse and said: "Inner cold, the moon is not going to stop." So Yun."
